SanarbiaFirstDialogue: ^???: Ah, now you two are a pair of new faces...
^???: Why yes... I know just about everyone that makes their way here, and I haven’t seen the likes of you before...
^???: My name is Sanarbia, I am a doctor around these lands.
^CIELLE: Nice to meet you! My name is Cielle, and this is my friend Cosmo.
^SANARBIA: Every cycle around the sun for ten days and ten nights, we hold the Aster Festival...
^SANARBIA: The four tribes come together to celebrate the origin of a bright future.
TheRest: ^SANARBIA: The Pluvia... the Navemar... the Calmaaj... and the Marquina like myself... we all come together as one and share these lands.
^SANARBIA: I can see that you have many questions about the land’s history and the festival.
^SANARBIA: I may be a Doctor, but I am also very knowledgeable about these lands.
^SANARBIA: I would be glad to answer all your queries...
^COSMO: That’s great! So tell us abou-
^SANARBIA: Show that you are truly wanting to learn about this land and the people here...
^SANARBIA: Find the three who hold those titles in these lands.
^SANARBIA: If you open your hearts and minds to each one of them…I will tell you all that you seek to know...
^COSMO: How are we meant to find these three specific people?! There's like... a bunch of people here!
^SANARBIA: Do not be afraid to talk to the locals... These people are bound to clue you in on your search...
^SANARBIA: Meet me back here once you have met with all three...
^COSMO: ...Well. I suppose it's only fitting to let as many people meet the star of the show: me!
^CIELLE: Plus... this is what we came here for - to explore!
^CIELLE: Elder, Overseer, Leader... Let's go Cosmo!
